text:
In January 2019 I met #auspol @DVAAus Minister @DarrenChesterMP & @DVASecretary, begged him to help veterans poisoned by ADF quinoline drug trials. His response was to let them die then poison a new generation in #chloroquine trials in 2020.
https://t.co/9fLvfZ9mCD
